content.text: I love The Spruce, it's a great resource for cleaning and home tips!
Me too! I also use it for recipes and gardening advice.
I've never been a very good gardener, but I've been trying to learn more.
It's a lot of fun, and it's so rewarding to see your plants grow.
I know, I love it when my flowers bloom.
I have a cat, and I have to be careful around him when I'm gardening, because he likes to knock over pots of flowers.
Aww, that's cute. I have a dog, but he's not interested in gardening at all.
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love animals and the outdoors.
I've never been to the Midwest, but I've heard it's beautiful.
It is! I miss it sometimes.
Me too! I love that movie.
I love Game of Thrones, it's so good
